title: Recover Cloud Infrastructure with AWS
description: Comprehensive guide for restoring EC2 instances, Elastic Load Balancers, RDS snapshots, and DNS records from Route53 after infrastructure failure.

title: Data Center Power Outage Recovery
description: Step-by-step guide for restarting on-premises equipment, verifying UPS/generator usage, and restoring connectivity after power outage.

title: Restore Production PostgreSQL from Snapshot
description: Instructions for identifying the correct backup, restoring to a new instance, and syncing with production environment.

title: Failover to Read Replica in Case of Master DB Failure
description: Promotes a replica to master, updates connection strings, and verifies application connectivity during database failover.

title: Redeploy Critical Microservices from Scratch
description: Rebuild and deploy all essential services using Docker/Kubernetes with fallback to specific Git commit hashes.

title: Rollback to Last Known Good Deployment
description: CI/CD-based rollback with canary monitoring, health checks, and logs validation to restore service stability.

title: Respond to Ransomware Attack
description: Isolate affected systems, activate forensics tooling, restore clean backups, and notify stakeholders during ransomware incident.

title: Rotate All User Credentials After Breach
description: Guides password and API key rotation across all internal systems, with priority levels by risk after security breach.
